document.full_text: lou dobbs, the pugnacious former cnn news anchor who flirted with the idea of running for u.s. president, is back where he wants to be, hosting a television show and free from his old network.
document.title: lou dobbs says tv is first love, not politics
lines_and_colors: lou dobbs, the pugnacious former cnn news anchor who flirted with the idea of running for u.s. president, is back where he wants to be, hosting a television show and free from his old network.
